title: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python, 2nd Edition: Practical Programming for Total Beginners
author: Al Sweigart
filename: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python, 2nd Edition: Practical Programming for Total Beginners (2019).pdf
overview: "Automate the Boring Stuff with Python, 2nd Edition: Practical Programming for Total Beginners" by Al Sweigart, published in 2019, is a comprehensive guide to using Python programming to streamline mundane tasks and processes. As the title suggests, this book focuses on the practical applications of Python, helping readers to automate tasks such as data entry, file management, and other repetitive activities. Written for total beginners, the book assumes no prior programming knowledge, making it an ideal resource for those new to programming. Al Sweigart's approach is known for being accessible and engaging, with a focus on real-world examples and hands-on exercises. This updated edition likely covers the latest developments in Python and automation, providing readers with a solid foundation in programming principles and the skills to automate tasks and increase productivity. Readers can expect a clear, concise, and entertaining introduction to the world of Python programming.
